title: Complete Backend API
description: Finish the REST API endpoints for the Task Management app

title: Design UI for Dashboard
description: Create the initial design mockups for the user dashboard.

title: Fix Bugs in Mobile App
description: Resolve the top 5 bugs reported by users in the mobile app.

title: Prepare Marketing Campaign
description: Develop a marketing campaign to promote the app's new features.

title: Write Blog Post on New Features
description: Create a blog post highlighting the new features of the app.

title: Research Competitor Features
description: Research the features offered by competitors to improve the app.

title: Integrate Payment Gateway
description: Integrate a new payment gateway for in-app purchases.

title: Update User Documentation
description: Revise and update the user documentation with the latest features.

title: Conduct User Feedback Survey
description: Send out a survey to users to gather feedback on the new features.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Improve the performance of the database queries to reduce load times.
